response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and expectations. Considering its worth to us and the market, we are offering this remarkable item to you at a special price of $950,000. We are confident that this offer presents an attractive balance between value and cost, ensuring you receive a high-quality product while also allowing us to realize a fair return on our investment. We look forward to discussing this further and potentially securing this transaction with you.", "product_price": 950000}
